name: Aedox
description:
Summary: You spawn with a running timer! Find your heart and run through the story, go to the dungeon to earn coins which can be used to buy roses from Ben to be delivered to a female character which will increase your timer, when the timer hits zero your heart deteriorates and therefore you have not kept it alive. When you increase the timer to 10 mins YOU WIN!

This game is not finished and we plan on turning this into a full game with a lot more content so follow us on itch.io if you are interested!

WASD - Movement

SPACE - Interact

H - Swing sword
